title: Authors and Citation
text: Morzaria-Luna H (2022). pssalmonsurvival: Sensitivity analysis salmon survival Puget Sound. R package version 0.0.0.9000.
code: @Manual{,   title = {pssalmonsurvival: Sensitivity analysis of salmon survival in Puget Sound},   author = {Hem Nalini Morzaria-Luna},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: Package for the analysis of cumulative impacts on salmon survival in Puget Sound. Simulated using an Atlantis Ecosystem model
